bilingual.source: The academic life lies in the exchange.
Now these are not just academic choices.
bilingual.target: 这些不仅是学术的选择。

bilingual.source: Thus reward can come without academic rigour.
bilingual.target: 因此奖励的评选并为考虑学术的严谨性。

bilingual.source: The mission of academic is taking place great change.
bilingual.target: 学术的使命正在发生重要的变化。

bilingual.source: A government should permit the free expression of academic opinions.
bilingual.target: 政府应当允许学术的百花齐放。

bilingual.source: The government should do something to ensure the free academic competition and encourage academic renovation.
bilingual.target: “去除官路子”，就是由政府保障学术的自由竟争，提倡学术创新、并帮扶其贯彻。

bilingual.source: Academic 1. concerning teaching or studying , esp. in a college or university
It contains a diverse range of information from academic and non-academic sources and the exercises that conclude each chapter make it easy to involve yourself with the content.
bilingual.target: 它包含了学术以及非学术的多方面信息，每一章包含的练习都很容易让你融入其中。

bilingual.source: The study of an academic discipline alters the way we perceive the wor ld.
bilingual.target: 对学术的研究改变了我们感知世界的方式。

bilingual.source: Selective innovation and innovative selection complement each other to constitute the solid foundation of the academic community and promote the academic development and prosperity.
bilingual.target: “选择性创新”与“创新性选择”，二者相辅相成，共同构造起学术共同体的坚实基础，促进学术的繁荣和发展。

list.abstract: academic，英语单词，作形容词时，意为大学的、学院的，作名词时，意为大学生、大学教师、学者。

yingyinNormal.en: Your point being? In academic vernacular, you cheated.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你的意思是？说白了就是你作弊。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't really hit my academic stride until I cut out that timesuck known as "playing outdoors."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真正在学术理论上取得进步是在我取消了浪费时间的"户外游玩"之后。

yingyinNormal.en: Looking out at your fresh young faces, I remember when I too was deciding my academic future as a lowly graduate student.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看见你们朝气蓬勃的脸庞，我回想起了我决定步入学术道路的那一刻，那时我还是个卑微的研究生。

yingyinNormal.en: See that? I just saved us 40 bucks. I've long said, what you lack in academic knowledge you make up for in street smarts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看到没？我帮我们省了四十块。我早就说过你学术知识的匮乏全弥补在市井小民的小聪明上了。

yingyinNormal.en: What? But he's a mediocre academic. And according to Beverly, his sexual prowess is subpar. He's basically Leonard with a bigger prostate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喜欢他什么？他只是个平庸的学者，而且贝弗莉说他的床技低于平均线呢，他根本就是一个前列腺肥大版的莱纳德嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: Obviously. Nothing is more important to me than her academic whatever, but with Alex, the important thing is keeping her close for the next four years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然啦，对我来说，没什么比她的学业更重要，但对于艾丽克斯，最重要的是接下来四年要把她留在身边。

yingyinNormal.en: My first C., after which my proctor told me that she was on the Admissions Committee, and I got admitted to Harvard for my personality, not my academic potential.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我第一次得C，这之后，我的学监告诉我说，她在招生委员会，招我进哈佛是因为我的品性，而不是因为学术潜能。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: And this week, my Secretary of Education, Arne Duncan announced a series of commitments to support students who need a little extra academic help getting through college.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本周，教育部长阿恩·邓肯宣布了一系列政策，将帮助需要帮助的学子顺利完成大学学业。

yingyinNormal.en: I guess I prefer to make people the old fashioned way. Well. Perhaps someday you could give me a history lesson in the archaic ways of our ancestors. For academic purposes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还是更倾向于用传统的方式造人。或许哪天你可以给我上堂历史课说说我们祖先最传统古老的方式。纯粹作学术讨论。

yingyinNormal.en: All of you who were admitted to a "small school" near Boston, either for your academic potential or your personality or both, you've had your first, whether it's a winter coat, a love or a C, you've learned more about who you are and who you want to be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们所有人都被录取到了波士顿附近的这所"小学校"，也许是由于学术潜质 也许是由于个人品性，你们经历过第一次穿冬装、第一次恋爱或第一次C，你们更加了解了自己是谁 以及自己想成为什么。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 学术成就；学业成绩；学业成就

sense_info_list.en: relating to an educational or scholarly institution or environment

examination_example.sentence: High growth rates increased the chances for <highlight>academic</highlight> innovation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高增长率增加了学术创新的机会。

examination_example.sentence: After going to school for 12 years, it doesn't feel natural to spend a year doing something that isn't <highlight>academic</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在经历十二年求学之后，花一年时间做非学术的事，感觉很不正常。

examination_example.sentence: The solution is to change the mindset of the <highlight>academic</highlight> community, and what it considers to be its main goal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 解决办法是改变学术界的思维模式，以及他们所认为的主要目标。

sense_info_list.en: a teacher or scholar in a college or institute of higher education

examination_example.sentence: Today is no different, with <highlight>academics</highlight>, writers, and activists once again warning that technology is replacing human workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天也不例外，学者、作家和活动人士再次警告说，技术正在取代人类工人。

examination_example.sentence: These two <highlight>academics</highlight> use an array of behavioral research to show that the most rewarding ways to spend money can be counterintuitive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两位学者利用一系列行为研究表明，最有益的花钱方式可能有违直觉。

sense_info_list.en: the subjects that you study in high school or college

examination_example.sentence: Gap year experiences can lessen the blow, making it easier to focus on <highlight>academics</highlight> and activities rather than acclimation blunders.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 间隔年的经历可以减轻这种打击，使之更容易专注在学科学习和活动上，而非适应环境的失误。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) interested in or excelling at scholarly pursuits and activities

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 学术成就；学习成绩；学业表现
学科；学术科目；学术学科

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: relating to an educational or scholarly institution or environment

examination_example.sentence: While the debate continues about the effect of homework on <highlight>academic</highlight> achievements, there are studies focusing on other benefits of homework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然关于家庭作业对学业成绩的影响的争论仍在继续，但也有研究关注家庭作业的其他好处。

examination_example.sentence: It isn't a school subject or an <highlight>academic</highlight> discipline, but it can be learned.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不是一门学校科目或学术学科，但它是可以习得的。

examination_example.sentence: Many residents have backgrounds in engineering, business and <highlight>academic</highlight> circles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多居民具有工程，商业和学术界的背景。

sense_info_list.en: the subjects that you study in high school or college
a teacher or scholar in a college or institute of higher education

examination_example.sentence: Unlike-minded <highlight>academics</highlight> say the inheritability of human traits is scientifically unsound.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 持不同观点的学者说，人类特征的可继承性在科学上是不可靠的。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) interested in or excelling at scholarly pursuits and activities

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: relating to an educational or scholarly institution or environment

examination_example.sentence: More than half of students will find their <highlight>academic</highlight> performance declining sharply when they enter the ninth grade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超过一半的学生进入九年级后会发现自己的学习成绩急剧下降。

examination_example.sentence: Now educators are experimenting with ways to apply this model to <highlight>academic</highlight> subjects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，教育工作者正在研究如何将这种模式应用于学术科目。

examination_example.sentence: What they believe is that their children must excel and beat their white peers in <highlight>academic</highlight> settings so they have the same chances to excel later.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认为，自己的孩子必须在学习上超越那些白人孩子，比他们更优秀，这样他们以后才能有同样的机会脱颖而出。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) interested in or excelling at scholarly pursuits and activities
the subjects that you study in high school or college

examination_example.sentence: But as these findings show, exercise and <highlight>academics</highlight> may not be mutually exclusive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但正如这些发现所表明的，锻炼和学术可能并不相互排斥。

sense_info_list.en: a teacher or scholar in a college or institute of higher education

examination_example.sentence: Boredom has, paradoxically, become quite interesting to <highlight>academics</highlight> lately.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 矛盾的是，最近“无聊”对于学者而言变得相当有趣。

examination_example.sentence: There have been concerns around the sugar content of cereal and the food industry's involvement in pro-breakfast research — and even one claim from an <highlight>academic</highlight> that breakfast is "dangerous".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们也一直担心谷物中的糖分含量，以及食品行业参与的支持早餐的研究，甚至有学者声称，早餐是“危险的”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: relating to an educational or scholarly institution or environment

examination_example.sentence: It promotes their <highlight>academic</highlight> performance and emotional growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它促进了他们的学业表现和情感成长。

examination_example.sentence: The gap year phenomenon originated with the months left over between entrance exams in November and the start of the next <highlight>academic</highlight> year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 间隔年现象起源于在11月入学考试和下一学年开始之间的几个月的空档期。

examination_example.sentence: Most universities host welcome events before the <highlight>academic</highlight> year officially begins, including freshmen orientations (迎新会), campus picnics, and entertainments like concerts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数大学在学年正式开始前都会举办欢迎活动，包括新生迎新会、校园野餐和音乐会等娱乐活动。

examination_example.sentence: Hundreds of scientists, writers and <highlight>academics</highlight> sounded a warning to humanity in an open letter published last December.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数百名科学家、作家和学者在去年12月发表的一封公开信中向人类发出了警告。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 学术

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: relating to an educational or scholarly institution or environment

examination_example.sentence: I’ve got three <highlight>academic</highlight> degrees so far.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，我已经获得了三个学位。
